    About

    Who am I?

    I’m Ivor, a computer engineering student at uOttawa. I like cybersecurity, artificial intelligence, project management, and building robots. Outside of developer-related stuff, I’m interested in architecture, cars, photography, urban design, and public transit.

    Contact

    My contact info can be found in the sidebar to the left. The best way to reach out to me is probably by LinkedIn message.
